manifestLibrariesDescription: In order for macros to work, we need to ensure that the sap.fe.macros library is maintained in manifest.json. Please see the code snippet.

id.existingIdValidation: An element with this ID already exists

filterBar.defaultPlaceholder: Enter a new filter bar ID

viewOrFragmentPath.defaultPlaceholder: Select a view or fragment file

chartBuildingBlockPropertiesDescription: Select the `View or Fragment File` where you would like to insert the chart building block and provide a `Building Block ID` to identify the chart.
Select an `Entity Set`, and a `Chart Annotation` you would like to use for the chart building block.
Select an `Aggregation Path` to determine where you would like the chart to be placed on the page.
chartVisualizationPropertiesDescription: Configure your chart using the properties below.
chartConfigureEventsDescription: Configure the below properties to react to events. Event handler methods are invoked when an event occurs.

id.validation: An ID is required to generate the chart building block

viewOrFragmentPath.validation: A View or Fragment is required to generate the chart building block

chart.contextPath: Enter the context path used in the page
chart.metaPath: Enter the relative path of the property in the meta model

filterBar.validation: Enter the ID of the filter bar building block associated with the chart
filterBar.placeholder: Select or enter a filter bar ID
filterBar.inputPlaceholder: Enter a new filter bar ID

chart.selectionChangePlaceholder: Enter a function to be executed
chart.valuesDependentOnEntityTypeInfo: Values are dependent on entity set

filterBarBuildingBlockPropertiesDescript: Select the `View or Fragment File` where you would like to insert the filter bar building block and provide a `Building Block ID` to identify the filter bar.
Select an `Entity Set`, and a `Selection Field Annotation` you would like to use for the filter bar building block.
Select an `Aggregation Path` to determine where you would like the filter bar to be placed on the page.
filterBarConfigureEventsDescription: Configure the below properties to react to events. Event handler methods are invoked when an event occurs.

id.validation: An ID is required to generate the filter bar building block

viewOrFragmentPath.validation: A View or Fragment is required to generate the filterbar building block

filterBar.metaPath: Enter the relative path of the property in the meta model
filterBar.filterChangedPlaceholder: Enter a function to be executed
filterBar.searchPlaceholder: Enter a function to be executed
filterBar.qualifierPlaceholder: Select a selection field annotation path
filterBar.valuesDependentOnEntityTypeInfo: Values are dependent on entity set

tableBuildingBlockPropertiesDescription: Select the `View or Fragment File` where you would like to insert the table building block and provide a `Building Block ID` to identify the table.
Select an `Entity Set`, and a `Line Item Annotation` you would like to use for the table building block.
Select an `Aggregation Path` to determine where you would like the table to appear on the page.
Provide the Associated Filter Bar ID if you want to link the table to an existing filter bar.
tableVisualizationPropertiesDescription: Configure your table using the properties below.

viewOrFragmentPath.validation: A View or Fragment is required to generate the table building block

id.validation: An ID is required to generate the table building block

table.qualifierPlaceholder: Select a line item annotation path

filterBar.validation: Enter the ID of the filter bar building block associated with the table
filterBar.placeholder: Select or enter a filter bar ID
filterBar.inputPlaceholder: Enter a new filter bar ID

table.valuesDependentOnEntityTypeInfo: Values are dependent on entity set
